name: Babastar Adventure - Demo
description:
This is the mascot platform adventure game on the silly website. It had as main inspiration kirby adventure of the nintedinho. The game only had this demo with 3 phases, the stencyl project was lost after a formatting if you liked it and you want it to continue to help me get a premium license from stencyl or you can acquire the rights for the production of the babastar game by contacting us .

Create by: Rodrigo Alessander(nife)

Control:
